VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Aether Corp?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {above} Aether Corp in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Corp relative to Echo Dynamics?
SRP.A: Aether Corp is {below} Echo Dynamics in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Dynamics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aether Corp}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's maximum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's maximum R&D Investment is in {2012}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's minimum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's minimum R&D Investment is in {1989}.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1996, did the total R&D Investment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total r&d investment between 1994 and 1996 was {smaller} than between 1998 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1989, did the total R&D Investment experience a larger or smaller change than between 2009 and 2011?
NC.A: The change in total r&d investment between 1987 and 1989 was {smaller} than between 2009 and 2011.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 2004, was the average total R&D Investment higher or lower than between 1987 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total r&d investment between 1990 and 2004 was {higher} than between 1987 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 2012, was the average total R&D Investment higher or lower than between 1991 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total r&d investment between 1992 and 2012 was {higher} than between 1991 and 2010.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Dynamics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aether Corp and Echo Dynamics first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aether Corp and Echo Dynamics did not exchange leading positions.
